His influence as far as the Sabbath is concerned is the same as that of the Seventh Day Baptists. Separate the Sabbath from the message, and it loses its force and power, but the Sabbath connected with the message of the third angel and the testimony of Jesus--the whole taken together--cannot be overthrown. They have a power and force which affects and convicts the 


                                     -296- 

unbeliever and infidel and brings them out with some strength to stand and live and grow and flourish.--Ms 3, 1862, pp. 4, 5. ("The Cause in Wisconsin," circa 1862.)
